title: Montezuma Castle National Monument: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar       Daily Ranger Programs  We offer daily ranger programs at 9:30 and 10:30 am.  Programs cover a wide range of topics and times are subject to change depending on staffing and availability.            Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 3 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Montezuma Castle National Monument Ranger Program      Time: 9:30 AM to 10:00 AM,10:30 AM to 11:00 AM,11:30 AM to 12:00 PM Location: Montezuma Castle National Monument Fees: Regular entrance fees apply     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Everyday  from 03/08/2016 to 03/08/2017 Rangers present on various topics (dependent on staffing) View Details      Montezuma Castle National Monument Sedona Academy of Chamber Singers Performance      Time: 10:00 AM Location: Montezuma Castle Interpretation Circle Fees: Regular fees apply     Thursday, August 18, 2016 The Sedona Academy of Chamber Singers will deliver a performance of patriotic and inspirational songs Thursday, August 18, 10 a.m., at Montezuma Castle National Monument.    View Details      Montezuma Castle National Monument Traditional Stone Bead Manufacturing and Beadwork Demonstrations      Time: 10:00 AM to 2:00 PM Location: Montezuma Castle Trail Fees: Free     Thursday, August 25, 2016 The continuing legacy of Native arts and crafts will be demonstrated Aug. 25 from 10 a.m. to 2 p.m.   NPS employees and volunteers will showcase the multifaceted process of fashioning stone disc beads and beadwork.
